extendedInfo.description: Shopping List, Pantry List & To-Do List in a small, intuitive and easy-to-use app. With Out of Milk, your Shopping List stays with you everywhere you go and you'll have it on-hand once you're ready to go grocery shopping. The Pantry List allows you keep track of your pantry items (spices, essentials, etc...) so that you always know what you have at home. The To-Do list helps you keep track of any other items on your daily list.â Creating an Out of Milk account, syncing and list sharing is completely FREE âPositively reviewed by the WSJ: 'The Out of Milk app is straightforward and offers three main list functions: shopping, pantry and to do.'Babble '#1 of Top 25 Apps For Moms', Nielsen 'Top 10 Most-Used Shopping Apps', CNET How To 'Simplify your grocery shopping on Android', Mashable 'Grocery List Apps That Make Shopping, Syncing Lists Simple'### Out of Milk Features ###-- Standard Features --â Multiple shopping & to-do listsâ Sync and share your shopping lists with others in real-timeâ Access your lists online from anywhere on http://www.outofmilk.com/â Save time by grouping items into categoriesâ Scan or manually enter items in your shopping listsâ Plan grocery listâ Shopping list history remembers itemsâ Pantry lists let you inventory anything so you always know what's in your pantryâ Share lists by text or emailâ Move or copy items between shopping list and pantry listsâ Displays grand total and running total on your shopping listâ View price history while editing a shopping list itemâ Mark items in your shopping list as tax-free. Out of Milk will also remember your choice for future referenceâ Browse and search local grocery deals, sales and promotionsOn top of all of our standard/free features (that stay free forever), we are also offering a Pro version for only $1.99! Just search for "out of milk unlocker" to purchase/install the key that will enable all Pro features. You need both this app and the "Out of Milk Pro Unlocker" installed for it to work.-- Pro Features --* Pick from different themes* Pick from different fonts* Customize tap and long-press actions* Widgets - Add list widgets to your homescreens* Coupons - Keep track of coupons in your shopping listsAs an Out Of Milk user, you will also get incredible support from our team which you won't get from other apps. So if you have a problem, just email us at support@capigami.com### Permission Information ###* Camera permission is needed for Barcode Scanner. - We only use this permission for the ability to use our barcode scanning feature. We do not record or store any photos or images. This is a basic, required permission.* Internet access permission is needed to lookup barcodes/product names. Internet access is also needed to sync with the cloud.* Vibrate permission is needed for To-Do reminder vibrate option.* Start At Boot - This permission is used so that we can send and receive push notifications in a timely manner. Push notifications are provided by http://www.parse.com in order to ensure a fast and seamless syncing process for our users.

reviews.title: What could make this WONDERFUL app better?
reviews.comment: I love this app. However, there is always room for improvement. 1. Coupon scanner 2. Menu Builder (like \"My Fridge Food\") 3. Receipt Scanner or reader, that can import purchase to help build and more accurately control food inventory and spending.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very Nice tool, works well, looks cool.
reviews.comment: Very Nice tool, works well, looks cool.
reviews.author: Ira Avant

reviews.title: Permissions are getting out of hand.
reviews.comment: I bought a simple syncing shopping list with no ads and reasonable permissions. What happened? Thankfully I have a backup to restore an older version. Also the promised expiration dates still haven\'t arrived as all the updates have been obnoxious ads.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very helpful.  Highly recommend!
reviews.comment: So convenient to use. Easy and so helpful.  Never forget another grocery item.
reviews.author: Jeanie Harrell

reviews.title: Absolutely awesome
reviews.comment: This app is great. No more paper lists that yor always forgetting. Love the bar code scanner. The fact it stores your regular list so your not constantly re adding. Awesome that it allows you to imput grocery prices. Excellent app. Thank you very much.
reviews.author: Diane Hawley

reviews.title: Use it every day
reviews.comment: I have said goodbye to paper lists that I usually forget to bring with me! This app is great. I just speak my lists and I\'m ready to go shopping and always have it with me. I like that I can keep multiple lists for different stores.
reviews.author: Susan Pate

reviews.title: To many permissions
reviews.comment: I originally got this app for its simplicity. New permissions and targeting are more than I am willing to accept. So much for paying for the pro unlocker...
reviews.author: Michael Papp

reviews.title: great!
reviews.comment: convenient-- love the website option and it\'s easy to scan in items and share lists.
reviews.author: Sola Hafthorsdottir

reviews.comment: I love this app! In the pantry portion I wish there was a way to update/change numbers so I know how much of each item Ihave and when its time to restock.
reviews.author: Monica Hoyer

reviews.title: Convenient & simple
reviews.comment: Totals up final shopping bill if u input quantity and price for each item, allows u 2 track price changes in shopping items, easy 2 us as a to do list as well. I use it everytime I need 2 add something 2 my shopping list whether its sams clu, sears, or safeway.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app for sharing shopping/to do lists!
reviews.comment: Love this app! Not only does it allow me to sync lists between multiple users it also links directly to my local store ads to help me find the best deals. Only downside is that it doesn\'t automatically sort my list based on category (e.g. produce, meat, frozen), but it does allow you to sort on your own. Love the ability to scan the barcode of an item at home that I\'ve just used to add it to my list.
reviews.author: Rebecca Short

reviews.title: Excellent, well done.
reviews.comment: Finally a decent to-do application. Practical in use, well thought out interface. Will be recommending this to others. Many thanks.
reviews.author: Zishan Qureshi

reviews.title: The absolute best...
reviews.comment: ...of all shopping list and To Do apps.  Best thing is that I can arrange the list by market layout, OR by destination order layout.  I NEVER forget what I need or where I have to go and when.  I\'m so organized, I pat myself on the back for being efficient and not wasting time or money.  Would love to have ringtone choices for various tasks.. hint, hint!
reviews.author: Maria Ciarlante

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: This app is SO useful - cuts my shopping time to about a third of what it used to be.  I just add items when I run out of them and they\'re there when it\'s time to go to the store.  I love the fact that my daughter can also add things to the list online so I don\'t make multiple trips back to the store.  Another great feature is the bar code reader.  It makes it easy to purchase the exact same item as I had before.  I also just discovered the categories tabs I can put in my lists!!  That makes this all the better for organizing my shopping lists according to the departments in the stores I visit.
reviews.author: Robin Siddle

reviews.title: Love this app!
reviews.comment: Great app! I love that I can keep track of everything I need and the app stores the list so when I go back to the store the next week, my usual items are still there. Plus, sending the entire grocery list to my husband if he\'s going to shop instead of me is super easy and I can send it right in a text message! I don\'t understand the need for all the permissions, however.
reviews.author: Ashley Starzec

reviews.title: Excellent and simple,
reviews.comment: Widgets could have more functionality i.e. the ability to, say, check off items directly from the widget, or maybe view more detail. Currently you have to open the app. Sometimes, it doesn\'t open the list of the widget that\'s been tapped. Other than that, it syncs across all my devices ( 2 x Galaxy Note, Note 10.1, and PC) and with my daughter\'s iPhone 3Gs. Shared lists are a very useful feature. Multiple widgets with multiple lists. Paper lists are a thing of the past..
reviews.author: Shaharin Yussof

reviews.title: So glad I found it!
reviews.comment: I had been looking for a \"to do\" app that would sync easily between phone and laptop, and also a shopping list app.  Found both in Out of Milk.  I am so happy because I use Google calendar and was disappointed that the Google app for tasks does not sync between phone and laptop. Out of Milk solved the problem beautifully.  I use the shopping categories for stores, not aisles in the supermarket, because that\'s how I always organized it.  I set up several categories in the to do lists, one for each of my inte
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great useful app
reviews.comment: Love it! I use it every week to get my groceries and keep myself on track. Makes it real easy to keep track of how much you\'re spending and keep up on what\'s on sale at all your local grocery stores. Shopping gets done so much faster now because I can keep everything organized, get exactly what I need, and avoid having to backtrack to get anything I missed.  The To Do List feature is also great. It\'s like having a personal assistant without having to pay for it.  The \"Add from history\" feature is also great. Everything you enter is stored in history so when you need to buy that item again, there\'s no need to retype it. You simply check off the items you need and then add them to your new list.  I\'ve been using this app for several months and it is such a great help.
reviews.author: Steve Diaz

reviews.title: Pretty good, does what I need it to do
reviews.comment: Overall, pretty good, controls a little odd, but not a steep learning curve.  I like that you can also have a \"to-do\" list, but figuring out how to delete a completed list took longer than necessary. (BTW, go to settings, customizations, to-do tap action, display menu; but even getting to settings wasn\'t terribly straightforward)  But it\'s still a good app.  Not to be confused with another \"milk\" app, which I tried over a year ago and didn\'t like.  I didn\'t think milk was all that popular in the real world...
reviews.author: Mark Rathgeber

reviews.comment: Major Timesaver!  I have an android tablet set up in the kitchen loggedin. When we run out of something ... Simply scan the barcode and it is on the list!  Our whole family is in college and our days are so busy between college and work.  ... This app is wonderful.  Whomever finds time to stop at the grocery store simply checks the list on their phone and checks items off.  Awesome!
reviews.author: Sharon Mehl
